document_data.name: Prison of the Southern Gate
document_data.mainbody: The '''Prison of the Southern Gate''' was a large dungeon located in the city of [[Dhaztanar]] in [[Semphar]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Prison of the Southern Gate was located within the [[Furdah Rustauk District]] in southwest Dhaztanar. As its name implied, the prison stood just a stone's throw from the [[Madinat]]'s southern gate. Only a small canal and several bridges separated the nobility of Dhaztanar from the criminals of the city.
document_data.Description: The main exterior surrounding wall of the prison was hexagonal in shape.
